name: heatbag
text: That one sounds fun.

name: hellofyellin
text: Somehow, I don't think that you'd have to work at McDonald's for six months to pull that off.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Pete was probably intensely watching customers once he had the head, in order to find the lady that most deserved this Act.

name: fielding
text: You got "Act" right, but I think it's "The Head", and "The Lady".

name: aaron_haynes
text: I tip my hat to you, sir.

name: envika
text: your Hat, that is?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: THESE KNIVES

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ...sorry for partying.

name: idsyen
text: I agree, but I would also add that the person most Deserving would not be the one who pissed him off the most, as a normal person might expect, but the most shining example of Purity and Innocence he could find, a truly Deserving Person.

name: luckypyjamas
text: nice pete is the daniel day-lewis of murders

name: hellofyellin
text:
You are suggesting that Pete is a "Method" murderer?

Man, I don't even know what to think about that.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: That is so true. Pete does not Think about the murder. Pete Is the murder.

name: crankheart
text: you wouldn't. i promise.

name: overmedicated
text: I would love Pete as my friend, I really think we'd relate.

name: aperson
text: I' sure he'd love to shoot a few hoops with you.

name: tekende
text: And go for a ride in his van

name: cleave
text: Pete's pose in the last panel is idyllic.  He is in his element, reminiscing fondly.  It is beautiful.

name: stuart
text: You want a toe? I can get you a toe, believe me. There are ways, Dude. You don't wanna know about it, believe me. Hell, I can get you a toe by 3 o'clock this afternoon... with nail polish.

name: ibetso
text: I didn't watch my buddies die face down in the mud so that you could post a comment like that!

name: _cheesekayke
text: Hmm, why only 3.8? I would have thought the last panel guaranteed a 4. Maybe people rated it low for grossness?

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shadowlink_97, Semiquaver, theplaidknight, Wite_Rabit)

name: semiquaver
text: Fuck along, now.

name: rowboat
text: It is lame that I don't like this strip every bit as much as you do. It truly is.

name: semiquaver
text: Sorry, I just don't get the appeal of rating a strip and then telling everybody how you rated it, unless it provoked an extreme reaction of some kind.  "I sort of didn't like it" is a uniquely soporiphic waste of people's time.  As is this discussion.

name: rowboat
text: I agree, I think. But you are picking nits a little, here.

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah, but can't you be just the slightest bit ashamed of being the nit?  Please, it's for my pride, which ain't been doing too well lately.  I mean I ain't got much to be proud of.

name: rowboat
text: Alright. Just this once, though.

name: semiquaver
text: You're a gracious man.

name: notcool
text: I hit F-11 just so that I can see your avatar appear three times on the page. Poor cows...

name: ocarina654
text:
Not rated high enough!
"That was a fun one"

name: _cheesekayke
text: I know, right? What is up with this?

name: dasilodavi
text: Susan Messing once told me the a key to comedy is in the details.  Just a foot in a salad, okay.  But at an Applebee's, with a Champion short sock on?  It's like triple the joke power for only a few words more!

name: asobi
text:
Jesus Christ I'm wearing a Champion short sock right now!

eyes dart quickly side to side

name: deancain29
text: Pete and Teodor are cold having drinks, reminiscing and shit.

name: jeet
text: Actually they found the chicken head in Mighty Wings . You think Nice Pete would be more particular about these things.

name: jujubeesforjesus
text: Pete's shenanigans mostly involve body parts in fast food chain meals.  And basketball.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: He's quite the kidder.

name: jugglinfreak
text: The alt-text makes this... maybe it's only 3.9 because people miss the alt-text? it's a 5 in my book

name: saulbellow
text: Um, did the alt-text say something funny when you looked at it?  Because now it just says "Inside the Murderer's Studio."

name: butta
text: I love that Nice Pete is so articulate and sits with his legs crossed. What a gentleman.

name: tucky
text: The cat had a human foot?

name: ojnabieoot
text: Yes.  Nice Pete murdered a human.  For a cat, he is very Good at murder.

name: tekende
text:
What do we think Nice Pete is doing in panel two?

I think he is casually inspecting his fingernails.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
the chick way, too...not the guy style of folding the fingers over the palm..

or he could be gesturing in a 'p'shaw!' way like 'but that ain't nothin' !'

name: fineoakstructure
text: chicken head in McNuggets? Is this why Pete isn't welcome in ANY McDonald's anymore?

name: blotto
text: I think that, combined with the 8 second scream pretty much sealed the whole chain-wide banning thing.

name: chester_fame
text: Nice Pete snuck a new flavor into the Cold Stone freezer: Mint n' Kidney Stone.
